lead_paragraph: Shares of Gap dropped after a dismal report and revelations of lower traffic in its stores heading into the holiday shopping season.

headline.print_headline: Wall St. Closes Down, Hurt by Drug Makers and Retail
headline.main: Wall St. Closes Lower, Hurt by Health Care and Retail
